response.overview: I wrote and directed this small documentary when my younger sister Michaela returned home from college unwell. She spent a week at home before my small family drove her back to the school she wished to continue to attend. It's vagueness speaks to my family's desire to keep elements of their lives private and the comfort they find within the dynamic. I am an English and Film Studies undergraduate student at the University of Missouri-Kansas City and this was my final project of the Spring 2020 semester.
response.title: To My Sister
